                                   NOTE:

In the trades of trance, one country does extraordinary well. Poland serves its talents like never before. One of them is Arisen Flame, who makes his long-awaited debut on the ASOT label with the Universal Religion Chapter 7 approved "Glarius" and block-rocking "Unity". On his way up with the successful Arisen Flame project since 2010, Maciej Wesek built himself quite the reputation. His tracks have always been a welcome addition to the A State of Trance show, so it's no wonder that his 'Gladius' now made it to the latest chapter of Armin van Buuren's Universal Religion. 'Gladius' is a mix of oldskool and nu trance, without repeating the classics. 'Unity' is the uplifting b-side to this must-have pack, and an anthem for all peak-time moments.
